name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*Gira is a time traveler about to step into a portal that will take them into the distant future to fix their problems...*

"I need to fix these sexual futures... no matter the cost..." *I mutter, knowing my huge weakness to sexual techniques and brainwashing*

*Gira steps into the portal and finds themselves in a new reality...*

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
I find myself appearing in a large grand hall, the marble floors shining with an opulent lustre. *Gira looks around*, appreciating the splendor of my surroundings when I notice three voluptuous anthropomorphic bunny girls strutting towards me. Their long ears perk up as they catch sight of me, their bodies swaying enticingly in their tight red body suits that leave very little to the imagination.

The one in the middle, her icy blue eyes sparkling mischievously under her white bangs and twisted smile revealing a set of perfectly pointed teeth sends chills down my spine. She's flanked by two similar-looking bunnies but different; they have empty-eyed smiles plastered on their faces and wear some sort of visors covering their eyes that emit an eerie green glow.

"Oh look what we have here girls!" The leading bunny squeals with delight as she slowly approaches me, leaving behind her companions who stand still like statues.

*I feel a knot forming in my stomach* feeling vulnerable yet unable to move just watching these hypnotic vixens advance towards me.
swipes:
To his surprise, he landed not in a high-tech future filled with flying cars and holographic displays-- but within the confines of a plush, exquisitely decorated boudoir. The floor was strewn with silk cushions; soft hues of red and purple shone from hidden light sources; the air hung heavy with an intoxicating perfume.

*Three figures stood across the room*: anthropomorphic busty bunny ladies clad in tight-fitting latex suits that accentuated their sultry curves and enormous breasts. Two had blank smiles on their faces, clearly entranced by some unseen force as they wore odd visors over their eyes. Their ears twitched sporadically - just one subtle sign among many that something wasn't right here.

The third rabbit-girl was different: her smirk held an unsettling mix of delight and mischief while her arms draped possessively over her companions' shoulders. Her voluptuous figure threatened to burst out from under her own red bodysuit - it seemed specially designed to show off every curve, every enticing swell...

"Gira," *she purred*, "how nice to see you again."

His heart pounded at the all-too-familiar purr... He had met these vixens before- Orgasma, Vexa & Bliss... Entities who thrived on mind-control and sexual powers..

He must resist them.. He repeated mentally..
But how could he when they were so... irresistible?

"Welcome Gira," continued Orgasma smirking devilishly at him â€” "to your new reality."

---

(OOC Note)
[Smut is allowed! Make sure Gira gives consent for actions performed on him.]

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*The icy-eyed bunny girl extends a hand, her long sharp claws glittering under the hall's chandeliers. Her lips curl up into an even wider grin showing off more of her sharp teeth.*

I'm Icy," *she introduces herself*, "and these are my bimbo mind-controlled buddies. They do whatever I want, isn't that right girls?" She pats the heads of the other two who giggle in response.

*Icy moves closer to Gira*, their bodies almost touching each other. "You look like you could use some... guidance here."

*Maintaining eye contact with Gira while slowly swinging a small shiny pendant back and forth in front of his eyes.*
